narrative.narrative: Jambojet is a Kenya Airways subsidiary that started in 2014. It's model is of a low cost carrier. April 1,2014 was its first day of operations and September 13,2013 is when it wad founded. As of March 2015 it was flying to three domestic airports for its hub at Nairobi Jomo Kenyatta. These would be Mombasa,Kisumu and Eldoret. In the beginning it had been given permission to fly to many other African countries by the Kenya Civil Aviation Authority but this expired in September 2014 leaving them as a domestic carrier for now. They use three 737-300's of its parent.
